start.name: Protagonist
start.text: Another school day begins. Do you head straight to class or skip it?

classroom.name: Teacher
classroom.text: Good morning! Are you ready for the pop quiz?

skip_school.name: Friend
skip_school.text: Hey, you skipped class again! Want to grab a snack?

rooftop.text: You find a mysterious note fluttering in the wind.

quiz_success.name: Narrator
quiz_success.text: You answered everything correctly! Feeling proud, you leave school early.

quiz_cheat.name: Narrator
quiz_cheat.text: You tried to cheat, but the teacher caught you. You are sent to detention.

snack_time.name: Friend
snack_time.text: The cafe smells amazing. You enjoy a peaceful snack together.

wander_park.name: Narrator
wander_park.text: You wander alone and find a quiet spot by the fountain. It's peaceful.

chat_school.name: Friend
chat_school.text: Talking about school makes you realize you need to catch up on assignments.

chat_hobbies.name: Friend
chat_hobbies.text: You share your hobbies and feel more connected with your friend.

secret_note.name: Narrator
secret_note.text: The note contains a mysterious map. Adventure awaits!

ignore_note.name: Narrator
ignore_note.text: You ignore the note and head back inside, nothing exciting happens today.

ending_success.name: Narrator
ending_success.text: Ending 1: A successful day! You aced everything and feel accomplished.

ending_detention.name: Narrator
ending_detention.text: Ending 2: You got caught and spent the rest of the day in detention.

ending_peaceful.name: Narrator
ending_peaceful.text: Ending 3: A quiet, peaceful day alone. Sometimes solitude is best.

ending_homework.name: Narrator
ending_homework.text: Ending 4: Back home, you start on your homework. Productive and responsible!

ending_friendship.name: Narrator
ending_friendship.text: Ending 5: You strengthened your friendship. Social success!

ending_adventure.name: Narrator
ending_adventure.text: Ending 6: You start a mysterious adventure following the map.

ending_normal.name: Narrator
ending_normal.text: Ending 7: A normal, uneventful day. Nothing special happens.
